divs: sighting detailsi'm taking care of my mother, who is disabled, and she woke me up just before 3:30am. not for the ufo but for her personal needs. after i got her settled, i went outside for a cigarette. i looked up from my chair on the porch, and saw the "star" looking object. then i noticed the smaller lights flashing in a circle around it. the lights were random, no particular order, and were fainter than the star-looking light. at one point a smaller light flashed on and went into the brighter light. i only watched it for about an hour, but it moved erratically, and i ran inside trying to find a camera. unfortunately i couldn't find one that would show the object\s. so i just went back to watch it for a little while before i went back to sleep. this is not my first sighting, but it's the first i ever reported. after a while you don't get so excited with them. each one was different. anyway, i'll attach a computer drawing of what i saw, but there's not much detail. hope it's helpful. sorry i couldn't tell you when it stopped either.
Summary: Bright light with small flashing lights flashing in circle around it
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around April 5th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
